title: Open to sky swimming pool at any level other than (xxii) above and excluding at ground level as provided in Regulation No 42 (ii)(a), shall be counted in FSI
clause_text: Open to sky swimming pool at any level other than (xxii) above and excluding at ground level as provided in Regulation No 42 (ii)(a), shall be counted in FSI. Any passage by whatever name not covered under DCR 31(1) shall be counted in FSI. Covered parking spaces/Garage as provided under Regulation No. 44 (6)(d) Area of fire escape balcony as provided in Regulation No 48(6)

source_pdf.text_snippet: Open to sky swimming pool at any level other than (xxii) above and excluding at ground level as provided in Regulation No 42 (ii)(a), shall be counted in FSI.
